snippet: The death of President Hugo Chávez seems to have had surprisingly little impact so far on global oil markets.
abstract: Death of Venezuelan Pres Hugo Chavez has surprisingly little impact on global oil markets, highlighting how country's dwindling crude production and exports have undercut its global power.
lead_paragraph: The death of President Hugo Chávez seems to have had surprisingly little impact so far on global oil markets.

headline.seo: Venezuela’s Role as Oil Power Diminished
headline.main: Dwindling Production Has Led to Lesser Role for Venezuela as Major Oil Power
headline.print_headline: Dwindling Production Has Led to Lesser Role for Venezuela as Major Oil Power

keywords.value: Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries
keywords.name: organizations
